list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the faculty or activity of imagining things, especially things that are impossible or improbable.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his research had moved into the realm of fantasy
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nghiên cứu của ông đã chuyển đến cõi tưởng tượng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a musical composition, free in form, typically involving variation on an existing work or the imaginative representation of a situation or story; a fantasia.
imagine the occurrence of; fantasize about.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: it is ludicrous to fantasy “disinventing” the hydrogen bomb
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Thật lố bịch để tưởng tượng "Disinventing" bom hydro
